title: Sun Shadow - Searching For Winds
description:
Neogoa returns with Dissolving Who We Are, the debut release by Sun Shadow (Alex Vinshu), a new-born Goa trance project from Russia. On this release he introduces his melodic yet powerful style in the first two tracks, ending the release with an interesting work of guitar-driven chill out. All tracks are written and produced by Alex Vinshu with additional guitars by A. Murash on track 3. Mastering by Stryder at Beavernest Atop Studios with artwork design by Richpa at Neogoa Design.

01 - Dissolving Who We Are (140 BPM)
02 - The Lost Temple (145 BPM)
03 - Searching For Winds (90 BPM)

Free download: http://www.ektoplazm.com/free-music/sun-shadow-dissolving-who-we-are

For more free Goa trance and ambient music, please visit us:

Website - https://www.neogoa.net
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/neogoarecords

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/neogoarecords

Bandcamp - https://neogoarecords.bandcamp.com
